# Warlord Campaign Contracts

> [!NOTE]
> Verifies `odin_protocol` logic: Adjudication, Nodal Progress, and Temporal Mocking.
> Symbols: `[@]` = Tyrant Profile, `[!]` = High Intensity, `[Git]` = Git Mock

GIVEN Warlord is Max Level [@][!]
WHEN High Intensity Scenario "A" is selected
THEN Adjudication returns SUCCESS
THEN Force remains > 90.0

GIVEN Warlord is Max Level [@]
WHEN Temporal Breach is activated "HEAD~1"
THEN Git Checkout is called [Git]
THEN Genetic Decay triggers (Level Drop) [SovereignHUD]

GIVEN Warlord is Max Level [@][!]
WHEN Player chooses "RETREAT"
THEN Nodal Progress is halved [SovereignHUD]
THEN Output contains "withdrawing" [SovereignHUD]
